reviews.customers_say: Customers find this jacket comfortable and cozy, with one noting it's not bulky. They describe it as unbelievably soft and rich in color, with one customer particularly appreciating the gold hardware detail. Customers praise its flattering style and spot-on fit, with the ability to cinch at the waist. They like the gold zipper and find it warm, with one mentioning it's perfect for chilly fall days.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Luxurious soft perfect jacket!
items.body: My jacket arrived today, and it is wonderful, far exceeded my expectations. It is luxurious. The Expresso color is fabulous. The fit is perfect and flattering. And all this is in addition to the coziness and feel of the "sooooo" soft fabric! Plus, the up/down zip will work so well for my needs. I wanted this jacket to take on the plane for my trips north from Florida and it is the perfect jacket to provide the warmth and comfort I was searching for. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy fall essential!
items.body: Cute fall staple, extremely soft and comfortable! Love the gold accents and ability to cinch waist. Read more
items.author: Jamie Testa

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Oprah's Favorite Thing 2025
items.body: Love this jacket. So cozy and warm and super cute. Nice quality and the shiny gold zipper elevates it. Read more
items.author: Elisa DAmato

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely love this Softies dream plush zip up!
items.body: Super soft and cozy! Love the cocoa color, which is lighter brown with a hint of a pink hue. Normally a size medium in tops, but generally order Lg or XL in jackets due to being tall with long appendages! As expected, the Large fit way better than the medium on me in the length of arms and jacket length overall. Only washed once so far and seems to do well. No shedding or pilling yet. So glad I splurged when this was on sale for about $70! Read more
items.author: Dr. Price

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Defective Zipper
items.body: As pictured, but have had issues with the zipper since day 1. Read more
items.author: JoJo

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars New favorite
items.body: Lovely jacket! Love how soft it is and it’s quite warm. The brown color is exactly the brown that I love. I would definitely buy it again. I bought a medium and I’m 5’6” 135 and the fit is perfect. Read more
items.author: Judi

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars This is... not well made
items.body: This fell apart while wearing it the seams came undone. The string holding the waist portion snapped. Ended up giving it to my dogs as bedding. Read more
items.author: tizzay

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Almond, Coco, Espresso. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
